testCase.name: Not Authenticated Guard when not authenticated should pass
Not Authenticated Guard when authenticated should redirect to homepage
AddCourseCard Component when loaded should renders
AddCourseCard Component when create button clicked should redirect to create course page
AddCourseCard Component when join button clicked should redirect to join course page
CourseCard Component when loaded should renders
CourseCard Component when course card clicked should redirect to course page
ViewCourse Component when loaded should renders
ViewCourse Component when user is not authenticated should redirect to login page
ViewCourse Component when user is authenticated should not redirect anywhere
Login when loaded has all of the required elements
Login when loaded test data input for login component
Register when loaded has all of the required elements
Register when sending request should show loading on button
PeopleInCourse when loaded should renders
displays message should renders
JoinCoursePage when loaded should renders
CreateCourse.vue should render correct forms
CreateCourse.vue when user is not authenticated should redirect to login page
CreateCourse.vue when user is authenticated should not redirect anywhere
CreateCourse.vue when all fields are filled form should be valid
CreateCourse.vue when submitted successfully should redirect to course page
CreateCourse.vue when submission is failed should display snackbar with error message
CreateCourse.vue when cancel button is clicked should redirect to home page
